libshapedraw.shape

Class WireframeLinesBlend

  • java.lang.Object
    • libshapedraw.shape.Shape
      • libshapedraw.shape.WireframeShape
        • libshapedraw.shape.WireframeLines

            • libshapedraw.shape.WireframeLinesBlend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XrayShape

    public class WireframeLinesBlend
extends WireframeLinesBlendIterable
    A series of connected line segments that smoothly blends from one line style to another along the segments.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface libshapedraw.shape.XrayShape

        SECONDARY_ALPHA

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WireframeLinesBlend(java.util.Collection<ReadonlyVector3> absolutePoints) 
      WireframeLinesBlend(Vector3 origin, java.util.Collection<ReadonlyVector3> relativePoints)
      Require a Collection rather than just an Iterable because we need to know the size before iterating for blending.
